version_description: Our wildly popular hair salon is now open for styling on iOS 8. Come on in, the customers are waiting!
Toca Hair Salon 2 is now optimized for iOS9, iPad Pro and we also made some other tweaks for newer devices. Enjoy!

We hope you’re having fun with Toca Hair Salon 2! We’ve made minor improvements with this version. If you enjoy playing with Toca Hair Salon 2, please leave us a review! Having trouble? Send us an email at support@tocaboca.com.
Thanks for sharing your feedback and reporting bugs — we’ve made some updates. Get the latest version to have the best experience! And leave us a review — we read every one of them!
